authors <- yaml::read_yaml("../../docs/authors.yml")

proc_one <- function(df, idx) {
  tmp <- df$authors[[idx]]
  
  affiliations <- unname(unlist(tmp$affiliations))
  full_names <- tibble::tibble(unlist(df$affiliations))
  stringr::str_replace_all()
  
  ret <- tibble::tribble(
    ~name, ~affiliations, ~role,
    tmp$name, paste0(unname(unlist(tmp$affiliations)), collapse = "; "), paste0(tmp$role, collapse = "; ")
  )
}
